title: 14 Women's Memorial Award
donor: President's Advisory Committee to Status of Women & University Women's Network
award_description: Offered annually to a continuing undergraduate student in any faculty. Registered full-time but need not be carrying a full course load
Demonstrated commitment to women's issues through activities on behalf of and for the advancement of women's equality.

title: 25th Anniversary Scholarship in Mathematics and Statistics
award_description: Offered annually to continuing undergraduate students in the Department of Mathematics and Statistics
One award offered in each of: Pure Math, Applied Math, and Statistics

title: 40th Anniversary Undergraduate Alumni Scholarship in Economics
donor: Department of Economics, family and friends of Lawrence Copithorne
award_description: Offered annually to a continuing undergraduate student entering third or fourth year in the Faculty of Arts, majoring in the BA Honours program in Economics

title: 54th Students' Legislative Council Student Assistance Bursary
award_description: Offered annually to continuing undergraduate students in any faculty. Registered full-time but need not be carrying a full course load
Two awards are based primarily on academic merit with financial need taken into consideration
Two awards are based primarily on financial need with academic merit taken into consideration
One award is based on contribution to student life at the University of Calgary through the Students' Union.

title: A Footprint in the Sand Bursary
award_description: Offered annually to continuing undergraduate students majoring in English. Registered full-time but need not be carrying a full course load
